name: Sk8Skull
description:
Skate with a skull while mastering stunts.

Game built in 64x64 resolution to participate in the #LOWREZJAM 2016.

CONTROLS:

  • [ ▲, W, Spacebar, Click, Touch ] :: Stunt
  • [ 1 - 9, +, -, Scroll, Pinch ] :: Scale the game from 1x until 8x
  • [ N ] :: Mute Music
  • [ M ] :: Mute Sound Effects

TOOLS:

  • [ GAME ENGINE ] :: Phaser
  • [ GRAPHICS ] :: Aseprite

CREDITS:

  • [ MUSIC ] :: R.O.D (Run or Die) by Hiperwave
  • [ SOUND EFFECTS ] :: 8-BIT Jump #1 by Jesús Lastra

NOTICES:

  • [ APR, 24 2016 ] :: POST-JAM release with scores, music and sound effects.
  • [ APR, 18 2016 ] :: I am a beginner and unfortunately could not complete the game on the jam's time, but I learned a lot trying to build it and I intend to release a finished version later this week.
